author: woonsan
msg: JS2-974: Fixed by unwrapping the request/response for local portlets.
So, tomcat can indicate the request to create another request. Thank you, Ate. His solution resolves this problem.

author: fhanik
msg: Configure fair queue by default, its faster.
Implement logic around when/how connections are treated as abandoned.
First one is by pool utilization, abandonWhenPercentageFull, the second one is to add a ResetAbandonTimer interceptor, so when successful invokations take place on the connection, it resets the time

author: tvolkert
msg: Added ThreadUtilities, and changed usages of Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader() to use ThreadUtilities.getClassLoader(), thus making Pivot work in the IcedTea plug-in for Linux and using custom boostrap applets.  Added TODO in that utility method noting that the method may be removed in the future.

author: lu4242
msg: MYFACES-2214 Incorrect method signature on handleExceptionList
